summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 DODGE RAM 2500.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 09V005000 (STEERING:LINKAGES:TIE ROD ASSEMBLY) AND IMMEDIATELY CALLED THE DEALER.  HE WAS INFORMED THAT THE PART FOR THE REMEDY WAS ON BACKORDER.  THE FAILURE HAS NOT BEEN REMEDIED PROPERLY.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 10,000.
